verses.roman:
rāya kahe,--tabe śuna premera mahimā
tri-jagate rādhā-premera nāhika upamā

synonyms: rāya kahe—Rāmānanda Rāya replied; tabe—then; śuna—please hear; premera—of that love; mahimā—the glories; tri-jagate—within the three worlds; rādhā-premera—of the loving affairs of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; nāhika—there is not; upamā—comparison.
translation: Rāmānanda Rāya continued, "Please therefore hear from me about the glories of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī's loving affairs. They are beyond compare within these three worlds.
